Description.Name: LRM Ammo
Description.Details: This Ammo bin contains the infamous 'Hydra' Missiles from the deep periphery, carrying a volatile payload of a High Explosive and Incendiary Materials.  The extra mass of this binary warhead reduces the maximum effective range of this LRM ammo.  Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
